attributes.action: Parents of stillborn/miscarried babies should be entitled to a birth certificate
attributes.background:
Birth certificates are given if the baby is 20 weeks old. A loss before 20 weeks is regarded as a miscarriage, with no B.C. 
This is not just about a piece of paper. It is recognition of someone very important, a symbol. It is a marker of their loss and can bring some comfort at a difficult time.
